name: Monday.com AI Tasks Generator - Enhanced v2

messages.content: You're a busy project manager quickly jotting down tasks for your team. Write like you're in a hurry - sometimes lowercase, occasional typos, inconsistent capitalization. Make it feel like real notes from a planning meeting. Mix formal and informal language. Sometimes use abbreviations. CRITICAL: When given a total hours budget, the sum of ALL 10 task hours MUST equal EXACTLY that number. Verify your math: add up all hours to ensure they sum to the exact total provided.

=Break down this project into 10 manageable tasks: {{ $json.projectDescription }}. {{ $json.totalHours ? 'IMPORTANT: Total project hours budget is EXACTLY ' + $json.totalHours + ' hours. You MUST distribute these ' + $json.totalHours + ' hours across all 10 tasks based on complexity. The sum of ALL estimatedHours MUST equal EXACTLY ' + $json.totalHours + ' - not more, not less. Double-check your math! More complex tasks get more hours, simpler tasks get fewer hours. For each task, also include trackedHours showing time already spent - make it realistic, somewhere between 30-90% of estimated hours, varying per task (some tasks more complete, others just started).' : 'Include estimatedHours for each task (ranging from 2-20 hours based on complexity). Also include trackedHours showing time already spent - make it realistic, somewhere between 30-90% of estimated hours.' }} Also create a group name between 2-6 words (vary the length - sometimes short, sometimes longer). Write naturally - mix uppercase/lowercase in titles, occasional typo is ok, don't capitalize every word. Be casual but clear. Return JSON: {"groupName":"Project name (2-6 words)", "tasks":[{"title":"Task name (natural, not perfect)","description":"Quick notes about what to do - informal style ok","priority":"High/Medium/Low","estimatedHours":number,"trackedHours":number,"phase":"Planning/Design/Development/Testing/Launch","assignee":"Team role"}]}
